name: Olingo O# Builder
short_description:
This project is under planning phase..
 
Olingo O# Builder is an Visual Rad IDE for the O#, C# and/or the Objective-C language for users who will built dotJET applications for Windows and Linux and later also MacOSX, IOS on IPhone, Android and Windows Mobile as well. 

Users can build and run different types of applications by using the visual gui designer inside Olingo O# Builder for drawing and placing widgets and components on forms and then write code using the O# language. Users can also mix O# code with C# and with the Objective-C Language and also be able to Mix C# and Objective-C code if he/she want. 

Users is also able to just using the C# code or  Objective-C code in the Code Editor, if he/she wants instead of mixing the code or using the O# language.

Olingo O# is going to be built for the new .Jet Framework which is still under construction and planning phase.
 
more info coming soon..
summary: An Visual IDE for developing in O#, C# and Objective-C
